name: Market Intelligence
description: Company news, SEC filings, economic data, analyst recommendations, and news sentiment from Finnhub, SEC EDGAR, FRED, BLS, and Alpha Vantage

finnhubApiKeyEnv.description: Name of env var holding Finnhub API key

fredApiKeyEnv.description: Name of env var holding FRED API key

blsApiKeyEnv.description: Name of env var holding BLS API key (v2)

alphaVantageApiKeyEnv.description: Name of env var holding Alpha Vantage API key

secEdgarUserAgent.description: User-Agent string for SEC EDGAR (required: company email format)
